articles.content: After defeating 12 celebrities with ease, the #MonsterReloaded challenge has finally ended with a thunderous roar coming from Samsungs camp. And in case you werent following up, heres a small refresh… [+5945 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft offers a temporary workaround for Patch Tuesday printer crashes - Neowin
articles.description: Yesterday, Microsoft acknowledged an issue with the new Patch Tuesday updates that were causing crashes on Windows. The company has now provided a temporary workaround to fix the problem.
articles.content: Earlier this week, Microsoft released a whole bunch of updates for Windows 10 users. These updates also included KB5000802 cumulative update that caused PCs to crash with 'APC_INDEX_MISMATCH' BSOD er… [+1487 chars]
